And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

If any one <S%H5315><s%> commit <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%>, and sin <S%H2398><s%> unwittingly <S%H7684><s%>, in the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; then he shall bring <S%H935><s%> his trespass-offering <S%H817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, a ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> out of the flock <S%H6629><s%>, according to thy estimation <S%H6187><s%> in silver <S%H3701><s%> by shekels <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, for a trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>:
